title: Cognitive Load Management Strategies in Biology Mobile Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic biological concepts and experience using mobile devices
context.additional_context: Learners Engage in Twice-Weekly Face-to-Face Sessions and Three Mobile Learning Activities per Week, with a Focus on Digital Resource Utilization for Biology Content Comprehension

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three cognitive load factors in mobile learning environments.
Learners can apply segmentation and modality principles with 80% accuracy when designing biology content using multimedia learning theory.
Learners can reduce cognitive load in mobile learning modules by 20% or more by applying pre-training and redundancy elimination techniques.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
